coreAttributes.name: Angelixx's diary
coreAttributes.description: A small, pink diary, with the name 'Angelixx' written on the front in flowing white script.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
You open the diary and flick through it, noticing immediately that Angelixx has exclusively used brightly-coloured gel pens to fill the pages. The succubus's handwriting is very girly, and you see that she's gone so far as to dot every 'i' with a little heart. The margin of almost every page is decorated with hearts, flowers, and other such illustrations.

Stopping on a random page to read a paragraph, you see that the contents of this diary are far more lewd, and at times sinister, than anyone would expect from its appearance:

[style.random( A cat-girl pushed me out of the way today and called me a 'silly little girl'. Luckily my boys were nearby, and so I had them take her down an alley and double-team her. I ordered them to cum all over her and then asked her who the silly-looking one was now.
(01/14) | This evening I got hit on again at the bar. He was a big, handsome zebra-boy, and I kind of have a weakness for all horse-morphs, so I let him take me back to his grotty little apartment and rail me hard on his bed. His fat fucking cock stretched me out so good, and after giving me a creampie he made me suck him off. Fuck, I'm getting horny thinking about it... I think I'll call a slave to come and pound me on the bed...
(02/14) | Mother wants me to increase the number of kidnappings, but insists that they be loners who won't have friends or family to report their disappearance. My gang's doing all they can, doesn't she know how hard it is?! At this rate I'll have to go back to seducing loners in the alleyways, and that'll seriously eat into the time I get to spend with my boys...
(03/14) | My good boys, Sleip and Nir, captured three refugees today! As a reward, I told them to come to my room at midnight, where I'd dressed up in their favourite lingerie and had a slave tie me to the bed. Fuck, they pounded me so hard for the rest of the night, I can barely walk this morning...
(04/14) | As I was teleporting the refugees to mother's shop, one of them called me a stupid little bitch. Fuck, that pissed me off. I got my boys to double-penetrate her dirty little cunt while I carried on teleporting the others. By the time I'd finished, the cunt's cunt was a gaping, cum-filled mess. I promised her that this was just a taste of her new life, before teleporting her too...
(05/14) | I went to the bank today, and the asshole in the lobby told me to go to the back of the queue. I told him who the fuck I am, and he realised his mistake. Too late! I got the stupid prick fired, and after making a potion to turn him into a big-titted horse-girl, I sent Sleip and Nir after 'her' to make sure 'she' learnt 'her' lesson...
(06/14) | That centaur who made me his cock-sleeve yesterday ended up getting me pregnant with triplets... Eugh... Horse-morphs are one thing, but pushing out demonic centaurs is really fucking tiring. I'll get some Mother's Milk later and get it over and done with. It kind of ruins my whole look when I'm pregnant anyway...

She was so dominant and direct in her behaviour that I couldn't help but get turned on, and when she grew herself a fat cock, I couldn't resist! She pinned me down and fucked me raw while my boys just stood there and watched...
(08/14) | Some of my gang members have disappeared... It's got to be the Enforcers who got them, or maybe it's a rival gang? Fuck, I'm not cut out for some kind of gang war! I'll seduce one of the Enforcers tonight and see what I can learn. Perhaps that big, hunky horse-boy who I've seen doing patrols?
(09/14) | Tonight I found that big, handsome horse-boy Enforcer I'd seen doing patrols. He was harder to seduce than I expected, and I had to fall back on telepathy to get him aroused. Oh well, I got what I wanted in the end. He didn't have any information on who was responsible for attacking my gang, but I did get his massive, fat cock balls-deep in my hot little pussy...
(10/14) | I got mugged in the alleyway today! A couple of dog-boys demanded flames from me, and one of them had an Enforcer's pistol! I know I could have beaten them, but I just couldn't move... After they took my flames, they said they'd give me their knots in exchange. Fuck, that got me wet, and so I let them rail me doggy-style right there on the floor...
(11/14) | I saw that assistant of Minotallys's today in the Farmer's Market. Alicorns really do it for me, so I ambushed him by the kissing booth stall and seduced him.
